bjdg.initRGBW|block: RGBW lights initialization, pin [PIN] total number of lamps [NUM]
bjdg.shownum1tonum2color|block: RGBW lights display color [COLOR] from [NUM1] lights to [NUM2] lights
bjdg.MFRC522Init|block: RFID-RC522 module initialization, SDA pin [SS] RST pin [RST]
bjdg.MFRC522get|block: RFID-RC522 module detects new card numbers
bjdg.MFRC522check|block: RFID RC522 module card number password matching array [num1], [num2], [num3], [num4], result output
bjdg.MFRC522resultback|block: RFID RC522 module pairing result assigned as [back]
bjdg.LCDInit|block: LCD module initialization, I2C address [adr] module column count [lie] module row count [hang]
bjdg.showstr|block: LCD module displays characters [str] in X: [num1] Y: [num2]
